thread.title: Hollywood Agency Hires Two Senior Account Executives, Mary-Catherine Citarelli and Joanna Weinstein

author: cnbc.com
title: Hollywood Agency Hires Two Senior Account Executives, Mary-Catherine Citarelli and Joanna Weinstein
text:
HINGHAM, Mass., Feb. 22, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Hollywood Agency announces two new additions to the team, Mary-Catherine Citarelli and Joanna Weinstein. Both join the agency as senior account executives working with Hollywood's business and consumer clients.
Mary-Catherine joins the team as a seasoned PR professional. She previously worked for four years at a Boston public relations agency focusing on consumer brands; her clients covered everything from pet products to video games and food. Before switching to consumer PR, she worked in high tech PR with brands such as Onapp and Acronis. At Hollywood Agency, Mary-Catherine will have a strong focus on media relations and social media efforts for clients such as TOMY International, Inc., Guidant Financial and The Edge Fitness Clubs.
Joanna made the transition to Hollywood Agency after working as an associate producer for CNBC Business News covering special projects. Her work spanned topics from food and wine to financial news and high-end real estate. Currently Joanna focuses on media relations, social media and brand positioning and messaging. Her clients include Vesper Technologies and Fusion Worldwide; she also assists with the agency's new business efforts.
"As our client base grows, we're excited to announce the expansion of our team as well," said Hollywood Agency principal and founder, Darlene Hollywood. "Mary-Catherine and Joanna both bring knowledge to the agency that complements the rest of the staff's talent and aligns with our clients' needs."
About Hollywood Agency
Hollywood Agency is a nationally recognized, integrated communications firm that makes brands famous. Partnering with compelling brands whose culture and values mirror its own, Hollywood Agency works with startups to Fortune 500 brands. Named one of the fastest-growing private companies in Massachusetts for two years running, Hollywood Agency has earned three dozen industry awards and has offices in Boston and San Francisco. To learn more, visit hollywoodagency.com or follow along on Facebook , Twitter and Instagram .
Deanna Haas
Hollywood Agency
